PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12502010-10-07,  ,  ,  ,  LAB, 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Canada Industrial Relations Remuneration Regulations
PrecisOrder Repealing the CANADA INDUSTRIAL RELATIONS REMUNERATION REGULATIONS in order to allow rates of remuneration for independent appointees to be set on a case by case basis through Orders in Council, as provided for in the Canada Labour Code.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0213 Publication Date: 2010-10-27
AttachmentsAttachment
